parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns laser target object created by given unit (vehicle or soldier) when using a laser targeting device.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[laserTarget]] unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - laser target or [[objNull]] if no laser target exists

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _target = [[laserTarget]] [[gunner]] heli;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _designatedPos = [[getPosATL]] [[laserTarget]] [[player]]; </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[cursorTarget]], [[setMissileTarget]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
